title: Zion's King Shall Reign
verses:
Zion's King shall reign victorious,
All his foes beneath his feet;
He shall make his people glorious,
Make his great salvation complete.

Hallelujah! Hallelujah!
He shall reign from sea to sea;
Hallelujah! Hallelujah!
King of kings eternally.

From the rising of the sun,
To the going down the same,
By his mighty power and strong,
Nations shall confess his name.

metadata.musical_notation: Present with treble and bass clef
metadata.theological_significance: Triumphant hymn celebrating Christ's ultimate victory and universal reign
